description: Number of decompositions of 2n-1 into sum of a twin lucky number and a twin even-lucky-number(from A045955, A045956).
comments: Conjecture: this sequence is always positive (with n>1).
example: 1 is not the sum of Twin lucky number and Twin Even-Lucky-Number, so a(1)=0; 3=1+2 (one way, so a(2)=1); 5=3+2=1+4 (so a(3)=2); etc.
author: _Naohiro Nomoto_, Oct 30 2000
